Name: Basil Bramble Sling
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
MUDDLE basil in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with mint sprigs bouquet and serve with a straw.
History: Created in 2003 by Alexandra Fiot at Lonsdale House bar in London, England. Inspired by Dick Bradsell 's Bramble cocktail
